projects.name: JS Calculator
description: One of my earliest javascript projects; I tried to keep it as real as possible, rarely copying logic from the internet; it was a fun way to learn javascript.

projects.name: Javascript Projects
description: A collection of small projects for learning javascript functions and approaches. Best suited for javascript beginners.

projects.name: Drum Kit
description: Interactive drum kit simulation; a simple and easy-to-create yet fun project to work on.
One of my fave vanilla js projects as a beginner.

projects.name: React Todo
description: Simple React Todo app with a simple design. It can obviously add, list, checkmark, and delete your tasks, but it does so in a simple manner.This is my first React project.

projects.name: Movie Loft
description: Movie Loft is a simple to use web-based movie database client. It could be useful when looking for movies and television shows. It also contains detailed information on a film or television show, such as the cast and crew, number of episodes, and so on.
Notably, it was a beginner-friendly project for learning open APIs and api integeration.

projects.name: Personal Website v2
description: This portfolio website was an intriguing project I created; it may appear a little fancy now, but it was a great learning opportunity to learn react in depth.
I had to put in some work to build bespoke animations, and changing states was a bit difficult. It was the beginning of my experience with the react library.

projects.name: Bisyam
description: One of the best projects I've worked on to date, it was an incredible learning experience. It is a platform that allows you to communicate with your loved ones while providing a smooth user experience.
It was a massive project to manage, thanks in part to the personnel behind it.
This is still being worked on.
